summary: This session demonstrates initial loader and memory integration for Titan.

topics.title: Boot File Loading
topics.summary: Loaded Titan Core v1 boot file and verified sequences.
topics.details: Confirmed Hello and Goodbye sequences, Precision Mode ON, external GitHub integration.

topics.title: Conversation Memory Handling
topics.summary: Created master index and example session to test persistence.
topics.details: Stored session summary and topics in GitHub JSON format, ready for retrieval via loader.

topics.title: User Preferences
topics.summary: Verified that user preferences can be loaded into session context.
topics.details: Preferences include cuisine, drink, activity, pets, entertainment, weather, and spice levels.
